pageTitle: Beach villa in Universal, Cyprus with 2 bedrooms, swimming pool | 76798
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {68356=A Modern comfortable Family Pool Side villa, on a beautifully landscaped complex with a large Private pool which also has changing rooms toilets and Showers, Sun beds and shades are Provided.. built by a prestigious house builder and furnished to a high standard it is within walking distance to shops, beach,harbour and old town. Two bedrooms Fully Furnished each with air conditioning one twin and one large double,which has a balcony overlooking the pool.Bath.Shower Sep Guests W.C. The spacious ground floor is open plan, with FULL AIR CONDITIONING/HEATING a well equipped kitchen,dining area and comfortable lounge area with English Satellite. TV.(please be aware that not all English Programmes are available). DVD and CD. opening out onto a private patio with garden furniture and Sun shade A FREE welcome pack is provided as well as a Mobile Phone. for the Guests use. All Linen and Towels provided..Please Note: Single Sex Bookings not available.Minimum stay 7Nights. Area Description: Directions Given or Taxis Arranged from Paphos and Larnaca Int: Airports. First of all travelling around Cyprus is as easy as driving in U.K. (on the Left), there is no need for adaptors as Electricty same as U.K. 240volts with 13Amp Sq pin plugs. There is so much to see and do for all ages,swimming scuba diving,wind surfing,Golf,hiking cycle hire,bowling skiing snow boarding, There are Water Parks, Zoo, animal sanctuaries ,visit Museums Archaeological and Historic Sites, Fantastic Restaurants serving all types of Cypriot ,English, Russian, Italian, Spanish, French, Food, English is Widely spoken throughout Cyprus,and Cypriot People and Very Friendly and Helpful. We Google Translate all Languages. Beautiful Sandy Beaches with warm water in the Early and Late Summer Months, Boat Trips and Troodos Mountains where you can Ski usually in the months Late December to Late Febuary. Paphos is an attractive laid back Coastal Town ( South West Coast) together with Our, Lovely, Modern Comfortable Villa in our /Small,Quiet Complex is just the place for your well earned Relaxing, Comfortable Holiday so try it you will not be disappointed. Terry and Sylvia Evans (Owners)., 45435=Last updated 01.08.2015, 52955=Thank you, Victoria Highams, for your review of our house in Cyprus where you stayed for 2 weeks in October last year 2010. we are pleased you enjoyed your stay and would be happy to have you, your family, and friends staying again when you wish. Kind Regards. Terry and Sylvia Evans.}
